data.title: Plastic Surgeons in Belgium: Book an online appointment for free
data.meta_description: Find quickly Plastic Surgeons in Belgium and book an online appointment for free. See prices, schedules and specialities.
data.text:
26

Plastic surgeons

Dr. Budo has been a plastic surgeon for 38 years and specializes in surgical and non-surgical facial rejuvenation. He has a special interest in cosmetic rhinoplasty.

Show more

Dr. Serge de Fontaine is surgeon specialized in plastic, Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery since 1992. He is a member of the Royal Belgian Society for Plastic Surgery. He is currently a consultant at the Clinic Claris where he is available on Monday. He specializes in cosmetic surgery of the face and the breast. He has a particular interest for facelifts and rhinoplasties. Additionally, Dr. de Fontaine is the clinical director for plastic surgery at the Érasme University Hospital (University of Brussels, ULB), where he is the supervisor beside the Ministry of Public health whilst also ensuring the education of specialized students in Plastic Surgery. He practices reconstructive surgery and upholds an interest for complex rhinoplasties. He also practices facial reconstruction following partial paralysis of the face and microsurgery. Dr. de Fontaine is currently the President of the Masters in specialization of plastic surgery at the University of Brussels (ULB). Content translated by google translate

Show more

Doctor Alexandru Paun, Plastic Surgeon, studied medicine at the “Carol Davila” University in Bucharest. During his specialized training in Plastic, Aesthetic and Reconstructive Surgery, he completed internships at the University Hospitals of Strasbourg (France), University Clinics of Bucharest, Saint-Pierre University Hospital Center in Brussels (Saint-Pierre University Hospital) and at the Saint-Pierre University Hospital Center of Luxembourg (CHL). Still within the framework of his assistantship, Dr Paun participates and successfully completes French university courses such as the University Diploma in Microsurgery (CHRU Strasbourg) and that of Surgical Anatomy of Lambeaux (CHU Bordeaux), allowing him to update and to perfect the theoretical and practical knowledge essential to Reconstructive Surgery. Passionate about Surgery and Aesthetic Medicine, Doctor Paun carries out Fellowships notably at Cronos Med (Bucharest) and Akademikliniken (Stockholm), considered to be world reference centers in the field. Trained with the best European surgeons, he developed a particular interest in breast, silhouette and facial aesthetic surgery. He participates in numerous international congresses of plastic and aesthetic surgery. Very attentive to his patients and very rigorous in his work, Dr Paun pays particular attention to patient follow-up.

Show more

Next availability

Dr. Gabriele Giunta is a certified surgeon in Plastic, Reconstructive and Aesthetic surgery (INAMI number 1-19461-43-210) and member of the Royal Belgian Society of Plastic, Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery. In 2012, he obtained his medical degree from the University of Palermo (Italy). In 2018 he graduated in Plastic, Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery at the same University of Palermo. Dr. Giunta has received intensive education in his sector of activity both in Italy and abroad. Indeed, during his studies, he had different international experiences in order to enrich his knowledge: Plastic, reconstructive, aesthetic surgery, hand surgery and microsurgery at the University Hospital Center ( University Hospital) – SOS Mains de Bordeaux (France). Plastic, reconstructive and aesthetic surgery at the Universität de Zürich (Switzerland) Plastic, reconstructive and aesthetic surgery at Universitair Ziekenhuis Brussel (UZ) (Brussels). During his academic career, Dr. Giunta developed a very marked interest in breast and lower limb reconstruction as well as head and neck reconstruction. In addition to his expertise in reconstruction, he has also developed a very strong interest in cosmetic surgery of the breast, stomach, body and face and in aesthetic medicine (injection of fillers, botulinum toxin, etc.). In 2019, he passed the Ebopras (European Board of Plastic, Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery) exam and became a Fellow of this Society (Febropras). That same year, he joined the clinical team of the Plastic Surgery department of UZ Brussel, under the direction of Prof. Mr. Hamdi in which he currently serves as a member of the permanent staff. Since 2021, he has worked at CHIREC-DELTA hospital as a consultant plastic surgeon. Dr. Giunta is also the author and co-author of numerous scientific publications and books in the field of cosmetic and reconstructive surgery.

Show more

Dr. Dimitri Tsepelidis completed his training and specialization at the Université Libre de Bruxelles (ULB). He also practices at the Jules Bordet Institute in Brussels in the field of breast and cervico-facial reconstruction. Dr. Dimitri Tsepelidis provides consultations in the field of facial surgery, breast reconstruction, post-bariatric surgery, liposuction, etc...

Show more

Next availability

Dr. Jacques Duchateau, plastic surgeon, graduated in plastic surgery, cosmetic and restorative from ULB in 1985. He is Chief of plastic surgery at the Eterbeek-Ixelles hospital center, since 30 years. He also works at the CHIREC and at the Erasme university hospital. He is co-founder of the new aesthetic clinic, Claris, located at La Houlpe, since 2014. He is also member of the Royal Belgian Society of Plastic Surgery. Content translated by google translate

Show more

Diplômée en médecine en 2011 à l’ULB, puis diplômée en chirurgie plastique en 2018 à l’ULB, j’ai ensuite effectué un résidanat de 4 ans à l’hôpital Erasme. En parallèle, depuis 2018 j’ai développé la reconstruction mammaire au CHU Marie Curie dans le service de la clinique du sein en collaboration avec l’équipe de sénologie. Activité que je poursuis toujours actuellement. Depuis début 2022 et en accord avec l’équipe de sénologie et de chirurgie plastique de l’Hôpital de Braine-l’Alleud – Waterloo, j’espère apporter un plus pour développer la reconstruction mammaire également au sein de cette dernière institution. Je pratique aussi la chirurgie plastique générale (chirurgie post-bariatrique, chirurgie esthétique du visage et du corps, cure d’oreilles décollées,…) avec un attrait particulier pour la chirurgie mammaire (esthétique et reconstructrice). Je suis également membre de la Société Royale Belge de Chirurgie Plastique.

Show more

Dr A. De Lange is a qualified surgeon in reconstructive and aesthetic plastic surgery from the Catholic University of Louvain. He specializes in facial and breast surgery, skin cancers and post-bariatric surgery. He also practices aesthetic medicine (Botox and fillers). Surgical rhinoplasty is not part of its activities. He welcomes you to the PolyCare Brussels center in Woluwe-Saint-Pierre.

Show more

Dr. Basmacioglu is a plastic and cosmetic surgeon specializing in plastic surgery, cosmetic surgery and reconstructive surgery. He has been practicing as a surgeon since he graduated in 2001. He welcomes you to the City-Clinic Chirec Louise located in Ixelles, Avenue Louise 235B. His consultations are conducted in French, English and Dutch. Practicing since 1995, he receives his patients by appointment for laser hair removal, breast reduction, gynecomastia, abdominoplasty and various other consultations which are detailed below.

Show more

Next availability

Les dernières tendances en traitements esthétiques non-invasifs et chirurgicaux (visage et corps).

Show more

Next availability

Dr. Lejuste is a plastic surgeon practicing at Cabinet Médical Les Échasseurs located in Namur. He is specialized in plastic, reconstructive and aesthetic surgery: breast surgery, breast reconstruction, body contouring, reconstructive surgery, facial surgery and dermatosurgery.

Show more

Practitioner Fanny Ballieux is a plastic, reconstructive and aesthetic surgeon who graduated from the Catholic University of Leuven. She specializes in cosmetic surgery, breast surgery and facial rejuvenation techniques. You can make an appointment with her if you are considering a PRP injection, a hyaluronic acid injection or liposuction to modify the parts of your body that need improvement. She regularly performs face lifts, thigh lifts, arm lifts, neck lifts, breast lifts with or without breast implants). She performs a variety of surgeries directly related to plastic or aesthetic medicine including abdominoplasty, eyelid surgery, facial lipofilling, breast lipofilling, gynecomastia and nymphoplasty. In addition to her private practice, she consults at the Chant d'oiseau medical center in Brussels every Tuesday from 1:00 pm to 8:00 pm and at the Clinic Claris every Monday from 9:00 am to 1:00 pm and every Wednesday from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm. The rest of the time she works at the Champs Elysées clinic in Paris. Unregistered practitioner

Show more

One of the best of his generation, Dr. Christophe Zirak has had a unique personal and professional experience. After his high school studies at the Lycée Janson de Sailly in Paris, he moved to the flat country in order to perpetuate the family tradition by becoming a Doctor. He obtained with honor the title of Doctor of Medicine in 2002 and the title of Specialist in Plastic, Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery in 2008 with good distinction. He worked at the Brugmann University Hospital until the beginning of 2015 as Assistant Head of Clinic. He was in charge of aesthetic surgery and medicine, reconstructive surgery and microsurgery, post-bariatric surgery (post-obesity) and hand surgery. During this period, he carried out numerous studies that have resulted in international publications. He organized the Brussels Microsurgery Course, seminars and workshops, as well as the BRA Days (Breast Reconstructive Awareness Days). His taste for teaching led him logically to accept to be a lecturer at the Inter-University Diploma of Chronic Wound Care and at the Francisco Ferrer High School as well as for the Nurses in Aesthetic Care. Afterwards, he was representative of Belgium and examiner at the European Board Of Plastic, Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery (2012-2014) of which he is also a member. Finally, since 2015, he is Head of the Department of Plastic Surgery at the Molière-Longchamp Hospital. He also consults and operates at the Delta Hospital (CHIREC). On a personal level, bathed in two secular cultures and coming from a family of doctors and academics, Dr. Zirak has developed an impressive capacity to listen. His great, almost feminine sensitivity and his academic rigor allow him to understand the needs of his patients and to respond to them in the best possible way. Moreover, her ability to use her expertise in the fields of medicine, cosmetic surgery and reconstructive surgery allows her to propose various therapeutic options. These options are best adapted to each type of patient, with the goal of enhancing their beauty and obtaining or restoring harmony to their body.

Show more

Next availability

A specialist in Plastic, Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery, Dr. Misani is a woman who is passionate about her profession and very attentive to her patients. Trained between Italy and Belgium, Dr. Misani was able to train alongside the most renowned surgeons in the field of plastic surgery.

Show more

Next availability

In the course of life, it sometimes happens that cosmetic surgery is the only option to achieve real personal fulfillment. A complex, the stigma of one or more pregnancies, the desire to slow down the signs of time or to repair the scars of an illness or an accident... Whatever the reasons that may lead you to push the doors of Dr. Gheerardyn's office, he will take the time to listen to you and to think with you about possible solutions to meet your expectations, taking into account technical and medical imperatives. With excellent training in Europe and the United States and 15 years of experience, he will ensure that you receive complete and personalized care from the first consultation to the post-operative follow-up. In a sector that is full of promises that are often erroneous and sometimes even dangerous, he will help you to sort out the interventions that are sometimes highly publicized but not very effective, and those that have proven themselves. However, open and attentive to the latest innovations, he will only suggest those that are truly effective.

Show more

Chirurgie plastique et esthétique enfants et adultes Chirurgie plastique: Reconstruction mammaire, Réduction mammaire, Gynécomastie Abdominoplastie, Exérèse de lésions cutanées ou sous-cutanées, Otoplastie Rhinoplastie Esthétique: Blépharoplasties, Lifting sourcil, cervico-facial, cervical, Lipoaspiration Lipomodelage ou lipofilling Augmentation mammaire Cure de ptose mammaire Lifting des bras et des cuisses Botox et a hyaluronique

Show more
